variable.name: type
variable.comment: Blank = Dementia status, at least moderate = No
variable.value: Mixed dementia: Alzheimer's disease and vascular dementia
Vascular dementia with no Alzheimer's disease
Neither Alzheimer's disease nor vascular dementia

variable.name: idtype
variable.comment: ID type and ID taken together form the study participant ID number.

variable.name: entry_date
variable.description: Date of entry into the "Dementia Moderate Plus Incidence" cohort
variable.comment: ENTRY_DATE is formatted MMDDYYYY. For display purposes, only month and year are listed. For SHARe - ENTRY_DATE is number of days since exam 1, do not format as a date. Number of days since exam 1.

variable.name: survdate
variable.description: Date of incident dementia, death, or censoring
variable.comment: SURVDATE is formatted MMDDYYYY. For display purposes, only month and year are listed. If the month was known, but the day was not, the 15th was used. If the year was known, but the month and day were not, then June 30th was used. This logic was used for event dates only, this does not apply to censoring dates or dates of death. For SHARe - SURV_DATE is number of days since exam 1, do not format as a date. Number of days since exam 1.
